text: The 2003 Formula 3 Sudamericana season was the 17th Formula 3 Sudamericana season. It began on 13 April 2003, at Autódromo Internacional Orlando Moura at Campo Grande and ended on 16 November at Autódromo Internacional Nelson Piquet in Brasília.
